amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Department of Defense to spend no more than $20 million in FY 2012 on motorsport sponsorships for NASCAR, the NHRA, the Indy Car Series, or AMA Super Bike Racing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a section to the bill limiting funds to be used for motorsports advertising and sponsorships to $20,000,000.
